mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", b.name AS "broker.name", b.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.persona_id AS "persona.id", p.name AS "persona.name", a.schedule AS "schedule", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.owner AS "owner", a.gid AS "gid", a.members AS "members", a.token AS "token", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN mod_broker b ON b.id = a.broker_id LEFT JOIN mod_persona p ON p.id = a.persona_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wx_group a
WHERE a.name = #{name} limit 1

SELECT
FROM wx_group a
WHERE a.gid = #{gid} limit 1

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", bb.name AS "broker.name", bb.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.name AS "name", a.owner AS "owner", a.members AS "members", dgt.label AS "type", a.gid AS "gid" FROM wx_group_task b left join wx_group a on b.group_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict dgt ON dgt.type = "wx_group_type" and dgt.value = a.type LEFT JOIN mod_broker bb ON bb.id = a.broker_id WHERE a.status="active" AND b.status = "active" AND a.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0 AND b.type="sendFeature"
AND a.broker_id = #{broker.id}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.owner AS "owner", a.gid AS "gid" FROM wx_group_task b left join wx_group a on b.group_id = a.id WHERE a.status="active" AND b.status = "active" AND a.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0 AND b.type="sendFeature"
AND a.broker_id in (select bb.id from mod_broker bb where bb.sys_user_id=#{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_group( id, broker_id, persona_id, schedule, name, type, owner, gid, members, token, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{broker.id}, #{persona.id}, #{schedule}, #{name}, #{type}, #{owner}, #{gid}, #{members}, #{token}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_group SET broker_id = #{broker.id}, persona_id = #{persona.id}, schedule = #{schedule}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, owner = #{owner}, gid = #{gid}, members = #{members}, token = #{token}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
